system.requirements: Adherent of Aleynikov Alternative Advance, 600xp. Medicae +10, Pure Faith
system.effect: Whenever Character removes damage from an ally with the Medicae Skill, the ally gains +5 to the next test they make before the end of an encounter per point of damage removed. (Up to +30).
